link.script: { "@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "SoftwareApplication", "operatingSystem": "Web app", "applicationCategory": "DeveloperApplication", "name": "pxCode", "headline": "Design to Development, 20x Faster, Elegant and Clean Code", "description": "pxCode is a Extremely Fast Visual Programming Tool for Responsive Web Design", "screenshot": [ "https://www.pxcode.io/image/heroscreenshot.jpg" ], "offers": { "@type": "Offer", "price": "0", "priceCurrency": "USD" } }

link.title: pxCode - Website Designs to Responsive HTML / React / Vue

meta.content: pxCode - Website Designs to Responsive HTML / React / Vue

meta.name: description

meta.content: pxCode - Website Designs to Responsive HTML / React / Vue
pxCode - Website Designs to Responsive HTML / React / Vue

div.style: position: absolute; inset: 0; z-index: 1000; height: 10000px; background-color: #ffffff

body.noscript: You need to enable JavaScript to run this app.

div.h1:
Website Designs to
Responsive HTML / React / Vueby pxCode

div.div: 20x Faster, Cost Effective and Clean Code

div.span: Got brand new Website Designs in Figma/Sketch? Get them converted into well responsive, pixel perfect, clean, and developer-friendly HTML / React / Vue with our Figma to HTML service.

iframe.title: YouTube video player
iframe.allow: accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture

div.h2: Challenges Encountered in Building a Website

ul.li: Software Engineers spend a lot of time converting designs into code.
Designers cannot present intricate responsive effects in design software.
Business Owners want faster results to make adjustments, but this causes communication and rework.

div.h2: A Revolutionary Way to Build Website

div.span: 20x productivity with clean code and pixel precision

Import design file directly!
100% Pixel Perfect to the original design without painful measurement of handoff tools like Zeplin

video.source: Your browser does not support the video tag.

div.span: No compromise on quality. Every pixel is accurately positioned according to the original design. Sketch/Figma to HTML!
No more painful and time-consuming measurement and hand-coding with handoff tools
pxCode enables designer to create any design you wish without limitation
One click for all source code and assets files. No more back and forth for assets export and management

video.source: Your browser does not support the video tag.

div.span: pxCode provide quick and straightforward editing and coding on screen. You have complete control over structure, layout, and code.
WYSIWYG, What you edit is the same to what you get in browsers with Instant Preview
Boost your productivity by editing with intelligent AI Assistant for responsive layouts
Support Media Query and Breakpoint, Pure CSS Responsive web design
Just one click to preview across browsers/device size and share to others with a link for communication

div.style: display: flex; align-items: stretch; width: 400%; transform: translateX(0%) translateX(0px); flex-direction: row;

div.div: Create and Reuse a Shared Component

div.span: Export well-structured code under your editing which is developer-friendly for integration, no more dependencies

video.source: Your browser does not support the video tag.

div.span: Code exported is well-structured under your editing. Exports are pure HTML / JS / SCSS / Tailwind CSS code, no dependencies
Ready for PHP, jQuery, Pure HTML, WordPress Gutenberg, Vue, React, Next.js. Freedom to pick any framework, hosting, CMS, platform — you own the full stack
Edit components once and reuse across pages. Better structure and modularity of the project
Integrates with React.js, Vue, Next.js (JSX/CSS in JS). You can edit component's props, sub-rendering, conditional rendering in pxCode.
You can create legible CSS classes based on pxCode BEM tree naming
No more semantic class names, now pxCode supports Tailwind CSS for HTML/React/Vue project

iframe.title: pxCode-example
iframe.sandbox: allow-forms allow-modals allow-popups allow-presentation allow-same-origin allow-scripts
iframe.style: width: 100%; height: 100%; overflow: hidden; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

br.div: Turn your design into the web in minutes

div.span: Explore
Learn & Get Help
Resources
Social
Community

span.style: background-image: url("./static/media/logo_discord.16d5df9ded8c37f2fc0021ae52cc9314.svg"); background-position: center top; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: 19px; width: 19px; height: 19px; font-size: 19px; transition: transform 0.24s ease 0s; vertical-align: text-bottom;

background-image: url("./static/media/logo_line.cce4e8229a46c5309536f498994200c4.svg"); background-position: center top; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: 19px; width: 19px; height: 19px; font-size: 19px; transition: transform 0.24s ease 0s; vertical-align: text-bottom;

footer.div:
All show cases are created and exported based on Creative Commons 4.0 Sketch/Figma
